thread.title: There's Now A Hello Kitty Grocery Store And It Is Dreamy AF
thread.title_full: There's Now A Hello Kitty Grocery Store And It Is Dreamy AF

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: There's Now A Hello Kitty Grocery Store And It Is Dreamy AF
text:
If you've already stocked up on Hello Kitty Wine but still feel like you need more Hello Kitty in your kitchen (and life), book a flight to Hong Kong, where a grocery store was converted into a Hello Kitty-themed supermarket.
The pop-up supermarket, which is within Sai Wan's Yata Supermarket, will run between now and May 31. The store will offer desserts, home decor, and dry grocery items that are all inspired by Hello Kitty. Even the grocery carts and shopping bags are Hello-Kitty themed.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Kitty supermart🍓🍅🍆🍈🍇🍉🍌🍠🌽 Supermart car Kawaii💓💓
A photo posted by ヤン🐹 (@corocoroyan) on Feb 11, 2017 at 12:19am PST
You've probably never been excited about a check out counter until right now:
一田xHello Kitty期間限定超市聽日就開幕啦！想知超市係點？留意住HK 港生活網站及Facebook啦！ #ulifestylehk #hk #hkig #西環 #yata #一田 #hellokitty #popup #一田西環 #一田西環hellokitty主題超市
A photo posted by HK 港生活 (@ulifestylehk) on Feb 10, 2017 at 7:34pm PST
The pastry section at Yata Supermarket has been entirely converted to Hello Kitty pastries:
各位女士們見到咁多Hello Kitty甜品係咪好想食呢,襯聽日係情人節,想試嘅就暗示吓囉😏😏😏🙊🙊🙊 #yatahellokittysupermarket #一田西環HelloKitty主題超市 #一田 #一田超市 #首先你要有 #不要再說了
A video posted by 一田百貨 YATA Department Store (@yatahk) on Feb 13, 2017 at 2:00am PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below I love that we live in a world where there's enough Hello Kitty treats to fill an entire grocery store.

There's even light-up Hello Kitty cotton candy.
#一田西環HelloKitty主題超市 @yatahk
A video posted by @duckkatie on Jan 26, 2017 at 4:12am PST
And Hello Kitty sushi!
Sushi 🍣 #hellokittysupermarket #sushi #hellokitty #sushibox #yubasushi
A photo posted by 📱Polly📷 (@pollypeko) on Feb 11, 2017 at 10:44pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below After the Hello Kitty Café in California opened last July, it's not surprising that there's now a Hello Kitty grocery store. All we need next is a Hello Kitty pizzeria and maybe even Hello Kitty hot chocolate so literally everything edible can be Hello Kitty-themed.
